FdoINetworkTSPCommand Class Reference

#include <INetworkTSP.h>

Inherits FdoINetworkCommand.

Inheritance diagram for FdoINetworkTSPCommand:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

FdoINetworkTSPCommand subclasses from FdoINetworkCommand and is the main interface that defines the FDO traveling salesman feature. An instance can be created through the FdoIConnection::CreateCommand method. Not all FDO providers will support this command. The FdoICommandCapability should be used to verify if a given provider support this command.

Note:
This Help topic is provided for informational use only. There is no interface or support provided. Autodesk reserves the right to change the software related to the content herein.

Public Member Functions

virtual FDO_API void SetNodeFeatures (GisString *className, FdoFilter *filter)=0
 This method is used to set an optional filter that resolve to a set of nodes that is used for the traveling salesman analysis.
